title: 1999/765/EC: Commission Decision of 15 November 1999 amending Decision 96/519/EC on financial aid from the Community for the work of the Rijksinstituut voor de Volksgezondheid en Milieuhygiëne (RIVM), Bilthoven, Netherlands, a Community reference laboratory for residue testing (notified under document number C(1999) 3753) (Only the Dutch text is authentic)

main_body: In Article 4 of Decision 96/519/EC the date "1 October 1998" is replaced by "1 May 1999".
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
